#ä¹Ÿæ„Ÿè°¢ç³–å–µæä¾›çš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶~
version: "3.4"

services:
  synapse:
    hostname: matrix
    image: matrixdotorg/synapse:v1.83.0
    restart: always
    container_name: matrix_server
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis
    ports:
      - "127.0.0.1:8001:8008"
    volumes:
      - ./synapse/data:/data
    networks:
      - synapse_network
      - external_network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -s localhost:8008/health || exit 1"]

  db:
    image: postgres:12-alpine
    restart: always
    container_name: matrix_db
    volumes:
      - ./synapse/db:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: synapse
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: é…ç½®æ•°æ®åº“å¯†ç 
      POSTGRES_DB: synapse
      POSTGRES_INITDB_ARGS: "--encoding='UTF8' --lc-collate='C' --lc-ctype='C'"
    networks:
      - synapse_network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "pg_isready", "-U", "synapse"]

  redis:
    image: redis:6.0-alpine
    restart: always
    container_name: matrix_redis
    volumes:
      - ./synapse/redis:/data
    networks:
      - synapse_network
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"]

networks:
  synapse_network:
    internal: true
  external_network:
